'Infected' is the name of a science fiction novel by author Scott Sigler. The
novel was initially released in 2006 in podcast format with a print release in
2008 by Crown Publishing, with Sigler continuing to offer the podcast version
online. [http://www.huffingtonpost.com/mark-jeffrey/make-the-iny-timesi-
bests_b_102184.html Make The NY Times Bestseller List... By Giving Your Book
Away] Huffington Post The book was initially titled Infested, [http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/rogue-random-book-
infested-137536 Rogue, Random book 'Infested'] Hollywood Reporter with
the name changing in order to distance itself from a movie releasing with a
similar title.
